data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Azad Kashmir.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Azad Kashmir, Azad Kashmir, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,894,846 lost people in  Azad Kashmir, Azad Kashmir, Pakistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, move the 11,001 believers in the county of Azad Kashmir to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Azad Kashmir, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Azad Kashmir to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Azad Kashmir, Azad Kashmir, Pakistan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Azad Kashmir, Azad Kashmir, Pakistan has a population of 3,945,300.

We estimate Azad Kashmir has 11,001 people who might know Jesus, 39,453 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,894,846 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 11,001 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
